channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: Raised in Baton Rouge, LA, and struggling with confusion about faith, Winn turned to alcohol to fill the God-sized hole in his life. His addiction spiraled out of control, but everything changed when his wife, a Seventh-day Adventist, invited him to church on the Sabbath. There, a powerful moment of connection with another reformed alcoholic sparked a dramatic transformation.
